sentences: Ted Key (born Anthony Matthew Key, 1 July 1960, Hull, East Riding of Yorkshire, England) was the original bassist in The Housemartins.
He was replaced in 1985 by Norman Cook.
Key originally played with a local band called The Gargoyles and continues to be involved in the Hull music scene and is the front man of Ted Key and the Kingstons.
He is married to a BBC Radio Humberside producer Katy Noone and has two sons.
